options.name: Improved Familiar
options.description: Your Familiar takes the form of a Level 1 Beast, inheriting its Statblock with a Knowledge and Social skill of -1.

options.name: Shared Magic
options.description: Your Familiar can Channel Beginner and Novice Spells that you know which do not require Focus or Components using your Conduit.

options.name: Battle Familiar
options.description: Your Familiar gains 5 Health, +2 Attack and +3 Damage.

options.name: Action : Familar Bond
options.description: You fall Unconscious and place your mind within your Familiar. For the next 10 Minutes, you can control the Familiar and use its senses.

options.name: Elemental
options.description: Your Familiar gains an Elemental Type, causing Physical Damage to be converted to that element and granting them a +5 Mitigation to that Damage Type.

options.name: Shared Connection
options.description: You and your Familiar gain Temporary Health equal to your Level at the end of a Full Rest. However, if your Familiar dies, you immediately take True Damage equal to your Level.

options.name: Ethereal Movement
options.description: Your Familiar gains +2 Movement Speed. Additionally, it gains a Fly and Swim Speed of 6 unless it is higher already.
